item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I know what you said. That’s why I said what I did.

Even if it’s not for games, you shouldn’t over do it. That’s a terrible model because of what I mentioned. You’ll learn that the hard way later on. It’s inefficient, on the renderer AND YOU. There’s no reason for it.

Just because you say you know something’s wrong with it, doesn’t excuse yourself of the criticism. If you know something’s wrong about it, then fix it. You saying you know it’s over poly and not to mention it just proves that you know something is wrong with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Assault Rifle .W.I.P
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

SomethingToHide:

You could VERY easily get rid of all the shitty polygons and even make it look better in the process. You’re also doing too much work when you have it like that.

Can you read when I said ‘I KNOW ITS OVER POLY!! XD’? Because I said that, I never set myself a goal for the polygon limit…

Read full topic
